pullRequest.title: Update pg regress pipeline
pullRequest.bodyText:
The pg_regress pipeline had become a bit stale and these changes help
bring it back up to speed.
Authored-by: Oliver Albertini oalbertini@pivotal.io

nodes.bodyText: what is this doing? Running tests twice?
